name: Obscura
description:
Obscura
Multi-Language Code Obfuscation Tool

What is Code Obfuscation?
Code obfuscation is a technique that transforms human-readable source code into a version that is intentionally difficult to understand while remaining fully functional. Its primary purpose is deterrence, not encryption - making it harder for others to analyze, copy, modify, or reverse-engineer your application logic.

How Obscura Works
Obscura converts source code into encoded representations and embeds a lightweight decoder inside the output. At runtime, your code behaves identically to the original while remaining protected. No external dependencies are required.

Supported Languages
HTML (HTML + CSS + JS in one file)
Bash
Python
JavaScript (separate file)

Common Use Cases
Protect proprietary logic in apps or scripts
Share demos safely without revealing full source code
Educational exploration of obfuscation techniques
Discourage direct reuse of code

Ethical Use
Obscura is intended for educational and defensive purposes only. Users must ensure they have proper authorization before obfuscating code that they do not own.

name: AI QUIZ
description:
AI Quiz App ‚Äì Learn Smarter, Not Harder


AI Quiz App is a smart learning companion designed to help students and learners test their understanding of any topic using AI-generated quizzes. Simply enter a topic or syllabus, choose the difficulty level, and the app instantly creates a structured quiz tailored to your learning needs.


Built with a clean, distraction-free interface, the app focuses on clarity, stability, and learning efficiency‚Äîno unnecessary clutter, no overwhelming animations, and no confusing navigation.
